mapper.select: SELECT E.WORKTEAM_EMP_ID , E.WORKTEAM_MGR_ID , E.SABUN , E.SYMD , E.EYMD , E.NOTE , C.ORG_CD , C.CLASS_CD , C.EMP_NM FROM WTM_WORKTEAM_EMP E, WTM_EMP_HIS C WHERE C.TENANT_ID= #{tenantId} AND E.SABUN = C.SABUN AND #{ymd} BETWEEN C.SYMD AND C.EYMD AND C.ENTER_CD= #{enterCd} AND #{ymd} BETWEEN E.SYMD AND E.EYMD AND (E.SABUN like CONCAT('%', #{sData}, '%') OR C.EMP_NM like CONCAT('%', #{sData}, '%')

SELECT A.SABUN , A.SYMD , A.EYMD , B.TENANT_ID , B.ENTER_CD , B.WORKTEAM_MGR_ID , A.WORKTEAM_EMP_ID FROM WTM_WORKTEAM_EMP A JOIN WTM_WORKTEAM_MGR B ON A.WORKTEAM_MGR_ID = B.WORKTEAM_MGR_ID AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} WHERE A.SABUN=#{sabun} AND (#{sYmd} BETWEEN A.SYMD AND A.EYMD OR #{eYmd} BETWEEN A.SYMD AND A.EYMD) AND #{workteamEmpId} != A.WORKTEAM_EMP_ID
